name: Clawdbot
description: Clawdbot is a personal AI assistant you operate on your own devices. It functions as a local-first gateway that connects to messaging platforms like WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, and iMessage. Features include voice interaction, live canvas workspaces, and multi-channel inbox capabilities. Clawdbot supports Claude and OpenAI models for AI-powered conversations and automation.

notes.text: After installation, run `clawdbot onboard --install-daemon` inside the container to configure API keys and messaging channels.
